about_the_game:
Grab your notepad, your flashlight, and maybe a couple friends, as you embark on a number of treacherous expeditions to close the curtains on a very secretive organisation rumoured to be conducting and creating abominations through the art of human experimentation.



Gather as much evidence as you can while ensuring to stay out of sight to cease operations in this organisation and save future factory workers from becoming nothing more than a memory by exploring the plethora of abandoned factories that were once under the ownership of the institute. Using the journalism skills that you’ve built up for years, walk inside and find absolutely anything and everything that can be used against the organisation and find out the actual truth about just what sort of freaks of nature have been brought into this desolate place by the butcherous organisation - and get this place shut down permanently.



Just make sure to tread carefully when you step through those factory doors, it would be wise to heed the local’s warnings about the figures in the shadows and the eyes that spy around every corner. While the documents on such figures are seemingly incomplete and are claimed to not exist, it would be wise to follow the information they give if you can find them. They know much more than you do, after all.



If you’re ever feeling like your pockets of cash are getting a little too full, why not head down to the shop? You can purchase all kinds of unique little gadgets and trinkets that you can use during your escapades through the darkness. Just be sure to watch your head when the crates come-a knocking!

Don’t be scared of the factory… you haven’t even opened the doors yet.

Wishlist "Don't Be Scared Of The Factory" now to stay up to date on the latest news and updates!

content_descriptors.notes: Mature content in the game includes creatures that could be made with body parts or show exposed guts chasing you, and death.
